TEST_NAME: Interactive Grids should avoid hardcorded tab indexes
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (
        select case
                 when (lower(trim(icon_view_icon_attributes)) like '%tabindex%'
                        or lower(trim(icon_view_link_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' ) then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               application_id,
               icon_view_link_attributes,
               icon_view_icon_attributes,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               region_name,
               interactive_grid_id,
	             workspace
         from apex_appl_page_igs
    )
select aapi.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a hard coded tabindex', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a hard coded tabindex', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.interactive_grid_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.4.3(A) : Focus Order : If a Web page can be navigated sequentially and the navigation sequences affect meaning or operation, focusable components receive focus in an order that preserves meaning and operability.
